feed.title: GitHub Elixir Weekly Trending
feed.subtitle: Weekly Trending of Elixir in GitHub

entry.title: blackmassgroup/vx_underground
entry.summary: A scalable web app features LiveView authentication, user roles and permission system, and secure S3/Wasabi uploads. It calculates file hashes with Erlang crypto library and uses Oban for all most API requests for automated retries. It includes a custom Logger backend to log to Discord, has CI/CD setup and is deployed on Fly.io.
